channel.title: SillyButts - Looking for Staff!
channel.description:
[size=26pt][b]We are currently looking for Moderators![/b][/size] [size=11pt][b]We are no longer looking for developers.[/b][/size]
Base: [PI] Hybris
[hr]
[center][img]http://sillybutts.net/img/logo.png[/img][/center]
[ul] [li][iurl=#introduction]Introduction[/iurl][/li] [li][iurl=#about]About Us[/iurl][/li] [li][iurl=#why]Why SillyButts?[/iurl][/li] [li][iurl=#moderators]Moderators[/iurl][/li] [li][iurl=#applying]Application[/iurl][/li] [li][iurl=#credit]Credits[/iurl][/li] [/ul]
[hr]
[img]http://sillybutts.net/img/forums.png[/img][size=2][b][anchor=introduction]1 - Introduction[/b][/size] Welcome to SillyButts, where anything can happen. If you think you've got what it takes to be a SillyButt, you're obviously in the right place.
[hr]
[img]http://sillybutts.net/img/welcome.png[/img][size=2][b][anchor=about]2 - About Us[/b][/size] SillyButts main objective is to provide a fun environment for the players and to give them lots of things to do. Everything on the server should be simple to do, and easy to figure out. We have multiple quests to start and we will be adding many more very soon!
[hr]
[img]http://sillybutts.net/img/help.png[/img][size=2][b][anchor=why]3 - Why SillyButts?[/b][/size] So, why should you choose to be a member of SillyButts? We have a lot of potential, and if you feel that you would like to be one of the first members of a large server, this could possibly be your chance!
[hr]
[img]http://sillybutts.net/img/createaccount.png[/img][size=2][b][anchor=moderators]4 - Moderators?[/b][/size] We are looking for [b]active[/b] members to be moderators! What will we be looking for in a moderator? You should be ACTIVE on both the [i]forums[/i] and the [i]server[/i]. It is advised that you learn how the server works so that if somebody may need help, you'll be able to provide that help. If we ever need additional Admins, our moderators will be the first to be promoted. No exceptions.
[hr]
[img]http://sillybutts.net/img/playnow.png[/img][size=2][b][anchor=appliying]5 - Moderator Applications[/b][/size]
Please use the following layout if applying:
[code] How old are you?: How can I contact you?: Do you think you'll be able to learn how our server works?: Time Zone?: How active can you be?: Will you be able to help us get players?: Additional Info: [/code]
[hr]
[size=2][b][anchor=credit]7 - Credits[/b][/size]
[b]Hybris:[/b] Our base If you feel that you've contributed something to this project and you are not on our team, please let me know so I can add you to this list.
---
Thank you for reading, please click the image below to see an album with screenshots of our website.
Here is a screenshot of our Splash page, click it to see an album with more images. [url=http://imgur.com/a/hW4T2][img]http://i.imgur.com/en6Fhl.png[/img][/url].
Side Note: When this is ready to be hosted, I'll be purchasing a VPS.

item.title: SillyButts - Looking for Staff!
item.dc:creator: @Mystic-Effect Mystic-Effect
item.description:
@Mystic-Effect wrote:

[quote=“I_Hybrid_I, post:36, topic:459838”][quote author=Mystic-Effect link=topic=562741.msg4118803#msg4118803 date=1349438938]

How old are you?: 15
How can I contact you?: skype: austin.barton2 or msn: ilovepking123@hotmail.com
Do you think you’ll be able to learn how our server works?: figure it out (:
Time Zone?: eastern
How active can you be?: as much as i can be.
Will you be able to help us get players?: yes.
Additional Info: i would like to be a server developer if you would let me.

Never accept him. He will do no work. He is not worth the try.

LoL get mad because my friend released your server.
[/quote]
‘my friend’ how did your friend get the source?
I dont think anyone is going to accept you if they know that you’re going to give it to ‘your friend’

// Im bored and wanne help you out so:

How old are you?: 15
How can I contact you?: You got my skype (Trilogy WingZ //  Pulse Leader) ;)
Do you think you'll be able to learn how our server works?: Yup, ofcourse I will.
Time Zone?: Amsterdam (+1)
How active can you be?: 3-4 hours a day, weekend 5-6 hours a day
Will you be able to help us get players?: I guess so, got Santa-x from 10 players to 40 players.
Additional Info: I'm playing soccer on Monday and Thursday so I wont be able to play much on these days.
  • Thanks, will contact you on skype.[/quote]

no they hired my friend and he released there source >.>

Read full topic

item.description:
@I_Hybrid_I1 wrote:

[quote=“neroxx, post:32, topic:459838”]How old are you?: I’m 14 years old.
How can I contact you?: [u][i]You can contact me via skype: Neroxxanon, or hotmail: jonasbor@live.no[/i][/u]
Do you think you’ll be able to learn how our server works?: Yes, I’m very sure I would be able to learn it.
Time Zone?: UTC/GMT +1 hour
How active can you be?: I could be active almost all the day after school. 8-9 hours a day.
Will you be able to help us get players?: Yes, I would be able to get players, and advertise.
Additional Info: I live in Norway, and I spend most of my time on my computer.[/quote]
Vouches for him
